instructions: Open the Instagram app and tap the profile icon in the bottom menu to go to your profile. Tap the menu icon in the top right corner. Tap Settings . Tap Privacy . Tap Story under Interactions. Tap Hide Story From . Tap the circle to the right of any name to apply a blue checkmark to anyone you want to hide your story from. Tap Done (iOS) or the blue checkmark (Android) in the top right. Anyone included in your Hide Story From list won't see your stories appear in their stories feed on the home tab or circled on your profile.
